Structs/PromiseLiteConfiguration.html#/s.name: debugger
Structs/PromiseLiteConfiguration.html#/s.abstract: A debugger object that can be used to debug promises.

Structs/PromiseLiteConfiguration.html.name: PromiseLiteConfiguration
Structs/PromiseLiteConfiguration.html.abstract: A configuration object that defines behavior for promises.

Protocols/PromiseLiteDebugger.html#/s:11.name: promise(description:initAt:)
Protocols/PromiseLiteDebugger.html#/s:11.abstract: Tells the debugger that a promise gets initialized.

Protocols/PromiseLiteDebugger.html#/s:11.name: promise(description:resolvesAt:)
Protocols/PromiseLiteDebugger.html#/s:11.abstract: Tells the debugger that a promise resolves.

Protocols/PromiseLiteDebugger.html#/s:11.name: promise(description:rejectsAt:error:)
Protocols/PromiseLiteDebugger.html#/s:11.abstract: Tells the debugger that a promise rejects.

Protocols/PromiseLiteDebugger.html.name: PromiseLiteDebugger
Protocols/PromiseLiteDebugger.html.abstract: Methods you can implement to observe promise lifecycle.

Classes/PromiseLite.html#/s:11PromiseLit.name: init(_:)
Classes/PromiseLite.html#/s:11PromiseLit.abstract: Creates a promise and executes the given executor.

Classes/PromiseLite.html#/s:11PromiseLit.name: init(_:executor:)
Classes/PromiseLite.html#/s:11PromiseLit.abstract: Creates a promise and executes the given executor.

Classes/PromiseLite.html#/s:11PromiseLit.name: flatCatch(_:)
Classes/PromiseLite.html#/s:11PromiseLit.abstract: Returns a Promise and deals with rejected cases only.

Classes/PromiseLite.html#/s:11PromiseLit.name: catch(_:)
Classes/PromiseLite.html#/s:11PromiseLit.abstract: Returns a Promise and deals with rejected cases only.

Classes/PromiseLite.html#/s:11PromiseLit.name: flatFinally(_:)
Classes/PromiseLite.html#/s:11PromiseLit.abstract: Returns a promise. This provides a way for code to be run whether the promise was fulfilled successfully or rejected once the Promise has been dealt with.

Classes/PromiseLite.html#/s:11PromiseLit.name: finally(_:)
Classes/PromiseLite.html#/s:11PromiseLit.abstract: Returns a promise. This provides a way for code to be run whether the promise was fulfilled successfully or rejected once the Promise has been dealt with.

Classes/PromiseLite.html#/s:11PromiseLit.name: resolve(_:)
Classes/PromiseLite.html#/s:11PromiseLit.abstract: Returns a Promise that is resolved with a given value.

Classes/PromiseLite.html#/s:11PromiseLit.name: resolve(description:_:)
Classes/PromiseLite.html#/s:11PromiseLit.abstract: Returns a Promise that is resolved with a given value.

Classes/PromiseLite.html#/s:11PromiseLit.name: reject(_:)
Classes/PromiseLite.html#/s:11PromiseLit.abstract: Returns a Promise that is rejected with a given reason.

Classes/PromiseLite.html#/s:11PromiseLit.name: reject(description:_:)
Classes/PromiseLite.html#/s:11PromiseLit.abstract: Returns a Promise that is rejected with a given reason.

Classes/PromiseLite.html.name: PromiseLite
Classes/PromiseLite.html.abstract: An object that represents the eventual completion or failure of an asynchronous operation, and its resulting value.
